creditline: Gift of the artist and Marian Goodman Gallery
description: black and white photograph of a manicured lawn with a white birdbath and white urn with a beach and sea in the background
marks: Signature and Date on back, in pencil: [David Goldblatt. / 9/1/86]
title: Thirteen kilometers of this coastline were a White Group Area, Blouberstrand, Cape Town
